eggWeakness.title: Energy sensitivity
eggWeakness.description: Each energy weapon attack that deals 1 damage, deals 1 additional damage

nemesisBodyWeakness.title: Stress reaction
nemesisBodyWeakness.description: During Surprise attack, Nemesis' Danger token value is reduced by 1 (to min. 1)

crewMemberBodyWeakness.title: Mobility
crewMemberBodyWeakness.description: Apart from Queen and Breeders, no other Nemesis can destroy closed doors
